dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT :START_DATE from_dt, :END_DATE to_dt, NVL(:LOCS,'ALL') loc_codes FROM DUAL

SELECT DISTINCT s.sail_date, sref1.shipment_refnum_value loc, sref2.shipment_refnum_value commodity, s.shipment_xid shipment_no, orem1.remark_text payment_terms, sref3.shipment_refnum_value booking_no, sref4.shipment_refnum_value contract_no, loc.country_code3_gid dest_country, TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') sail_date, orem2.remark_text advising_bank, TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.total_net_weight_base * 0.0004536,3)) total_mts, srem1.remark_text total_sum, srem2.remark_text bank_charge_type1, srem3.remark_text bank_charge_amount1, srem4.remark_text bank_charge_desc1, srem5.remark_text bank_charge_type2, srem6.remark_text bank_charge_amount2, srem7.remark_text bank_charge_desc2, srem8.remark_text bank_charge_type3, srem9.remark_text bank_charge_amount3, srem10.remark_text bank_charge_desc3, srem11.remark_text bank_charge_type4, srem12.remark_text bank_charge_amount4, srem13.remark_text bank_charge_desc4, srem14.remark_text bank_charge_type5, srem15.remark_text bank_charge_amount5, srem16.remark_text bank_charge_desc5, srem17.remark_text bank_charge_type6, srem18.remark_text bank_charge_amount6, srem19.remark_text bank_charge_desc6, srem20.remark_text bank_charge_type7, srem21.remark_text bank_charge_amount7, srem22.remark_text bank_charge_desc7, srem23.remark_text bank_charge_type8, srem24.remark_text bank_charge_amount8, srem25.remark_text bank_charge_desc8, srem26.remark_text bank_charge_type9, srem27.remark_text bank_charge_amount9, srem28.remark_text bank_charge_desc9, srem29.remark_text bank_charge_type10, srem30.remark_text bank_charge_amount10, srem31.remark_text bank_charge_desc10 FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssul.order_release_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref4 ON s.shipment_gid = sref4.shipment_gid AND sref4.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.CONTRACT NO' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark orem1 ON ssul.order_base_gid = orem1.order_base_gid AND orem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.PAYMENT TEXT' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark orem2 ON ssul.order_base_gid = orem2.order_base_gid AND orem2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_ADVISING BANK' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON s.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem1 ON s.shipment_gid = srem1.shipment_gid AND srem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.SUM OF ALL BANK CHARGES' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem2 ON s.shipment_gid = srem2.shipment_gid AND srem2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 1 TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem3 ON s.shipment_gid = srem3.shipment_gid AND srem3.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 1 AMOUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem4 ON s.shipment_gid = srem4.shipment_gid AND srem4.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 1 DESCRIPTION' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem5 ON s.shipment_gid = srem5.shipment_gid AND srem5.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 2 TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem6 ON s.shipment_gid = srem6.shipment_gid AND srem6.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 2 AMOUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem7 ON s.shipment_gid = srem7.shipment_gid AND srem7.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 2 DESCRIPTION' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem8 ON s.shipment_gid = srem8.shipment_gid AND srem8.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 3 TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem9 ON s.shipment_gid = srem9.shipment_gid AND srem9.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 3 AMOUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem10 ON s.shipment_gid = srem10.shipment_gid AND srem10.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 3 DESCRIPTION' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem11 ON s.shipment_gid = srem11.shipment_gid AND srem11.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 4 TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem12 ON s.shipment_gid = srem12.shipment_gid AND srem12.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 4 AMOUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem13 ON s.shipment_gid = srem13.shipment_gid AND srem13.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 4 DESCRIPTION' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem14 ON s.shipment_gid = srem14.shipment_gid AND srem14.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 5 TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem15 ON s.shipment_gid = srem15.shipment_gid AND srem15.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 5 AMOUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem16 ON s.shipment_gid = srem16.shipment_gid AND srem16.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 5 DESCRIPTION' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem17 ON s.shipment_gid = srem17.shipment_gid AND srem17.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 6 TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem18 ON s.shipment_gid = srem18.shipment_gid AND srem18.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 6 AMOUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem19 ON s.shipment_gid = srem19.shipment_gid AND srem19.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 6 DESCRIPTION' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem20 ON s.shipment_gid = srem20.shipment_gid AND srem20.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 7 TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem21 ON s.shipment_gid = srem21.shipment_gid AND srem21.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 7 AMOUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem22 ON s.shipment_gid = srem22.shipment_gid AND srem22.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 7 DESCRIPTION' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem23 ON s.shipment_gid = srem23.shipment_gid AND srem23.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 8 TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem24 ON s.shipment_gid = srem24.shipment_gid AND srem24.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 8 AMOUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem25 ON s.shipment_gid = srem25.shipment_gid AND srem25.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 8 DESCRIPTION' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem26 ON s.shipment_gid = srem26.shipment_gid AND srem26.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 9 TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem27 ON s.shipment_gid = srem27.shipment_gid AND srem27.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 9 AMOUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem28 ON s.shipment_gid = srem28.shipment_gid AND srem28.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 9 DESCRIPTION' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem29 ON s.shipment_gid = srem29.shipment_gid AND srem29.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 10 TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem30 ON s.shipment_gid = srem30.shipment_gid AND srem30.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 10 AMOUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem31 ON s.shipment_gid = srem31.shipment_gid AND srem31.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BANK CHARGE 10 DESCRIPTION' WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND (TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (:LOCS IS NULL OR (NOT :LOCS IS NULL AND sref1.shipment_refnum_value IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOCS,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt))) ORDER BY s.sail_date DESC
